parameters.name: LastRecommendationDateTime
parameters.label: Generated On
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| summarize max(TimeGenerated)

parameters.name: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
let ActiveGlobalSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isempty(InstanceId_g) and isempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
let ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceId_g)
| extend SubscriptionGuid_g = InstanceId_g
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, SubscriptionGuid_g;
let ActiveInstanceSuppressions = materialize(AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, InstanceName_s);
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveGlobalSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and SubscriptionGuid_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g2)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.InstanceName_s == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g3)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.ResourceGroup == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g4)
| where isnotempty(SubscriptionName_s)
| distinct SubscriptionName_s
| order by SubscriptionName_s asc

parameters.name: TagName
parameters.label: Tag Name
parameters.query:
let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where isnotempty(Tags_s)
| extend jsonTags = parse_json(Tags_s)
| extend tagKeys = bag_keys(jsonTags)
| mv-expand tagKey = tagKeys
| extend tagKey = trim(' ', tostring(tagKey))
| where tagKey !startswith 'hidden' and tagKey !startswith "aks-managed" and tagKey !startswith "kubernetes.io"
| distinct tagKey
| order by tagKey asc

parameters.name: TagValue
parameters.label: Tag Value
parameters.query:
let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where isnotempty(Tags_s) and isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}'])
| extend tagValue = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}'])
| distinct tagValue
| order by tagValue asc

content.json:
# Latest Recommendations
Generated on **{LastRecommendationDateTime}**. If recommendations generation date is *unset*, review the latest Automation Account runbooks status and fix accordingly.

content.query:
let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
let ActiveGlobalSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isempty(InstanceId_g) and isempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
let ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceId_g)
| extend SubscriptionGuid_g = InstanceId_g
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, SubscriptionGuid_g;
let ActiveInstanceSuppressions = materialize(AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, InstanceName_s);
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or SubscriptionName_s in ({Subscriptions})
| where Impact_s in ({Impact})
| where Category in ({Category})
| where iif('{TagName:label}' == '<unset>' or '{TagValue:label}' == '<unset>', true, isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) and tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) =~ '{TagValue}')
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveGlobalSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and SubscriptionGuid_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g2)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.InstanceName_s == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g3)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.ResourceGroup == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g4)
| summarize count() by Category
content.title: Count by category

content.query:
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(730d)
| where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or SubscriptionName_s in ({Subscriptions})
| where Impact_s in ({Impact})
| where Category in ({Category})
| where iif('{TagName:label}' == '<unset>' or '{TagValue:label}' == '<unset>', true, isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) and tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) =~ '{TagValue}')
| extend Weight = iif(Impact_s == 'Low', 1, iif(Impact_s == 'Medium', 5, 15))
| summarize WeightedCount=sum(Weight) by Category, bin(TimeGenerated, 7d)
| join kind=inner ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(730d)
    | where ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or ContainerName_s in ({Subscriptions})
    | summarize ResourceCount=sum(toint(ResourceCount_s)) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
) on TimeGenerated
| extend Score = round((1-todouble(WeightedCount)/todouble(ResourceCount))*100,1)
| project Category, TimeGenerated, Score
content.title: Optimization Score by Category Over Time (weighted by recommendation impact and overall resources count)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-27d
| where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or SubscriptionName_s in ({Subscriptions})
| where Impact_s in ({Impact})
| where Category in ({Category})
| where iif('{TagName:label}' == '<unset>' or '{TagValue:label}' == '<unset>', true, isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) and tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) =~ '{TagValue}')
| make-series RecCounts=count() on TimeGenerated from todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-27d to todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}') step 7d by InstanceId_s, RecommendationDescription_s
| where array_length(RecCounts) == 4 and not(set_has_element(RecCounts, 0))
| summarize count() by Text='over past 4 weeks'
content.title: Long standing recommendations #

content.query:
let PreviousWeek = AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-8d and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-1d
| where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or SubscriptionName_s in ({Subscriptions})
| where Impact_s in ({Impact})
| where Category in ({Category})
| where iif('{TagName:label}' == '<unset>' or '{TagValue:label}' == '<unset>', true, isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) and tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) =~ '{TagValue}')
| summarize PreviousWeekCount=count() by InstanceId_s, RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-1d
| where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or SubscriptionName_s in ({Subscriptions})
| where Impact_s in ({Impact})
| where Category in ({Category})
| where iif('{TagName:label}' == '<unset>' or '{TagValue:label}' == '<unset>', true, isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) and tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) =~ '{TagValue}')
| summarize ThisWeekCount=count() by InstanceId_s, RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| join kind=leftouter (PreviousWeek) on InstanceId_s, RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(InstanceId_s1) and isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| summarize sum(ThisWeekCount) by Text='since previous week'
content.title: New recommendations #

content.json:
* Estimated cost savings are relative to 30 days of consumption.
* Cost values are based on the currency of your consumption agreement. Adjust the currency parameter below to reflect your actual currency (changing the currency code does not perform any currency exchange in cost values).

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: The currency to display savings amounts. Must be your Azure consumption agreement currency.

parameters.name: USDRate
parameters.label: USD Rate
parameters.description: Used to convert some of the Azure Advisor-generated USD savings into your currency. If your currency is USD, set the rate to 1.

parameters.name: RecommendationsSubType
parameters.label: Type
parameters.query:
let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
let ActiveGlobalSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isempty(InstanceId_g) and isempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
let ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceId_g)
| extend SubscriptionGuid_g = InstanceId_g
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, SubscriptionGuid_g;
let ActiveInstanceSuppressions = materialize(AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, InstanceName_s);
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where Category == 'Cost'
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveGlobalSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and SubscriptionGuid_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g2)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.InstanceName_s == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g3)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.ResourceGroup == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g4)
| extend Origin = iif(RecommendationSubType_s startswith "Advisor", "Advisor", "Custom")
| where Origin in ({Origin:value})
| distinct RecommendationSubType_s
| order by RecommendationSubType_s asc

let ActiveGlobalSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isempty(InstanceId_g) and isempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
let ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceId_g)
| extend SubscriptionGuid_g = InstanceId_g
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, SubscriptionGuid_g;
let ActiveInstanceSuppressions = materialize(AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, InstanceName_s);
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where Category == 'OperationalExcellence'
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveGlobalSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and SubscriptionGuid_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g2)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.InstanceName_s == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g3)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.ResourceGroup == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g4)
| extend Origin = iif(RecommendationSubType_s startswith "Advisor", "Advisor", "Custom")
| where Origin in ({Origin:value})
| where RecommendationSubType_s in ({RecommendationsSubType:value})
| distinct RecommendationDescription_s
| order by RecommendationDescription_s asc

let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
let ActiveGlobalSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isempty(InstanceId_g) and isempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
let ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceId_g)
| extend SubscriptionGuid_g = InstanceId_g
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, SubscriptionGuid_g;
let ActiveInstanceSuppressions = materialize(AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, InstanceName_s);
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where Category == 'Performance'
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveGlobalSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and SubscriptionGuid_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g2)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.InstanceName_s == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g3)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.ResourceGroup == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g4)
| extend Origin = iif(RecommendationSubType_s startswith "Advisor", "Advisor", "Custom")
| where Origin in ({Origin:value})
| distinct RecommendationSubType_s
| order by RecommendationSubType_s asc

content.query:
let beginTime = todatetime('{LastRecommendationDateTime}')-6d;
let ActiveGlobalSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isempty(InstanceId_g) and isempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g;
let ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions = AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceId_g)
| extend SubscriptionGuid_g = InstanceId_g
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, SubscriptionGuid_g;
let ActiveInstanceSuppressions = materialize(AzureOptimizationSuppressionsV1_CL 
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime and FilterStartDate_t < beginTime and FilterEndDate_t > now()
| where FilterType_s in ('Snooze','Dismiss')
| where isnotempty(InstanceName_s)
| project RecommendationSubTypeId_g, InstanceName_s);
AzureOptimizationRecommendationsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > beginTime
| where Category == 'Performance'
| where "'*'" == "{Subscriptions}" or SubscriptionName_s in ({Subscriptions})
| where Impact_s in ({Impact})
| where iif('{TagName:label}' == '<unset>' or '{TagValue:label}' == '<unset>', true, isnotempty(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) and tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{TagName:label}']) =~ '{TagValue}')
| where FitScore_d >= {PerformanceFitScore}
| where RecommendationDescription_s in ({PerformanceRecommendations})
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveGlobalSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g1)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveSubscriptionSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and SubscriptionGuid_g
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g2)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.InstanceName_s == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g3)
| join kind=leftouter ( ActiveInstanceSuppressions ) on RecommendationSubTypeId_g and $left.ResourceGroup == $right.InstanceName_s
| where isempty(RecommendationSubTypeId_g4)
| summarize count() by SubscriptionName_s
